summary: You don\'t Find Chuck Norris....Chuck Norris Finds You
descriptionHtml:
Chuck Norris has come to Skyrim and he is looking for you....
He is now in Dragonsreach.........go in front of the palace for him to find you more easily
He now speaks to you........still working on dialogue.....
And just to say something....Chuck is not a typical follower, he will follow you 99% of the time......meaning that he is not \"bound\" to you like other followers(YOU DO NOT CONTROL CHUCK NORRIS!!!!!)
The mod is still in beta...so there will be updates such as bug fixes, additional dialogue.....etc.

Installation
Place files in Data folder
tick the esp file in data files
wait for him to find you....or seek him out
author: daxetron

files.name: Chuck Norris v1b
files.changelogHtml:
Chuck is now unaggressive(will not attack inocents)
Added speech
CTD-s hopefully fixed( I did this version with CK not Sskyrim NPC Editor)
